text: Darryl Jones (born December 11, 1961), also known as "The Munch", is an American bass player. Jones currently plays for The Rolling Stones. He has also played in bands with Miles Davis and Sting. ==Discography== ===The Rolling Stones=== ;Studio albums # Voodoo Lounge (1994) # Bridges to Babylon (1997) # A Bigger Bang (2005) # GRRR! (2012) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:The Rolling Stones Category:African-American musicians Category:American bass guitarists Category:Musicians from Chicago
title: Darryl Jones
